title: Demo Level: The Great Inside Joke Hunt
description: A time-consuming journey through layers of inside jokes and references from our actual conversations

questions.question: What do you call a group of 69 people who are all confused about their direction in life?
questions.explanation: The folder name '69_Btches' is the key! It's a playful reference to being lost and confused.

questions.question: In our WhatsApp chat, what nickname did you suggest I should use instead of 'Tito'?
questions.explanation: You suggested 'PH' because it's already in your name and sounds really cool! Plus it matches my own nickname pattern.

questions.question: In our chat, what did you say when I asked about your Instagram handle?
questions.explanation: You gave me your Instagram handle as 'luv_tit.o' - a playful take on your nickname!

questions.question: What did you say when I mentioned saving your contact as 'miss wahito'?
questions.explanation: You said 'ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚umeanza mapema!' - meaning I was starting early with the teasing!

questions.question: What was the name of the school where you were head girl but also jumped fences to buy snacks?
questions.explanation: Elizabeth Academy! You were head girl but also a 'fox in sheep's clothing' who jumped fences for snacks!

questions.question: What height did you claim to be when I asked?
questions.explanation: You said you were 5'4 - close to my guess of 5'2! And you mentioned you'd be taller in heels.

questions.question: What do you do for work? (Hint: You mentioned it's not exactly software engineering)
questions.explanation: You're a UI/UX Designer! You said you call it software engineering to add depth, but you're specifically into UI/UX design.

questions.question: What was the name of the mean friend I had in class 2 who I got into a fight with over juice?
questions.explanation: Jacob Muya! I threw his water bottle with juice across the class and scratched his face. War is raw!

questions.question: This is a deliberately time-consuming question. What's the 47th word in this sentence: 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog and then runs around the house three times before stopping to catch its breath and look at the beautiful sunset while thinking about all the things it could have done differently in life if only it had made better choices and not spent so much time running around in circles when it could have been more productive and focused on its goals and aspirations for the future'?
questions.explanation: Trick question! The answer is 'sunset' - we always end up talking about sunsets in our conversations!

questions.question: How many siblings do I have? (Hint: I mentioned having 5 sibling in-laws)
questions.explanation: I have 4 siblings! I mentioned having 5 sibling in-laws, which means 4 siblings + 1 = 5 in-laws total.

bonus_round.title: The Ultimate Time Waster
bonus_round.description: This is where we really test your patience and make you feel like time is slipping away...
bonus_round.task: Find the hidden message in this seemingly random text: 'Harley loves to code at 3 AM when the world is quiet and the bugs come out to play. The circus of debugging begins with a simple semicolon and ends with existential questions about life, the universe, and why CSS never works the way you expect it to.'

completion_message: Congratulations! You've successfully wasted time in the most entertaining way possible. Welcome to the circus of inside jokes! ðŸŽª
unlock_requirement: Complete all questions and bonus round
